short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NoSpoilers helps you avoid spoilers by masking text containing specified keywords. Browse with confidence, spoiler-free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NoSpoilers helps you avoid spoilers by making paragraphs containing specified keywords invisible. Browse with confidence, spoiler-free. 

You can also block political figures, trigger words, or even your ex's name. The text is made 90% transparent, so if you really want to know what's there, you can.
